channel.title: Nebula - Shard Development
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2hnthdk.png[/img][/center]
[b]About[/b]
This is a 317 Shard development, with a 459 gameframe and a 474 cache. I'm using a base called Reality which I plan to spend a few months tweaking, cleaning and expanding via my own creative touch.
[i]What to expect:[/i]
[ul][li]Better combat system[/li] [li]Low experience rate[/li] [li]Economy driven; make it yourself (only the essential shops)[/li] [li]Castle Wars, Fight Caves, Fight Pits, Pest Control, Custom minigame for clans[/li] [li]Storyline theme; but not required[/li] [li]Small details, such as interactive world objects (bookcases, doors, ladders, chests, drawers etc.)[/li] [li]Easter eggs (the hidden references kind)[/li] [li]Secrets (i.e. hidden trapdoors that are not announced but someone may come across if they explore well enough)[/li] [li]Lots of random events and quests for adequate rewards[/li] [li]More than one way to train your skills (and not released until they are done properly)[/li][/ul]
[b]Features[/b]
[IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t372/NebulaeRSPS/wc_zpsf6008490.png[/img]
[ul][li]Bronze-dragon axes, the better the axe, the faster it cuts[/li] [li]Each axe requires the correct level[/li] [li]All trees require the correct level with the correct logs (normal/dead, oak, willow, maple, mahogany, teak, yew and magic) [/li][li]Bird nests[/li] [li]Random events (ent, evil tree, genie, strange old man)[/li][/ul]
[b]Progress Log[/b]
Project started: Nebula (18th Sep. 2012).
[b]Media[/b]
[IMG]http://i1056.photobucket.com/albums/t372/NebulaeRSPS/243571b9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15ydvo5.png[/img]
[i]Thread still under construction.[/i]

item.title: Nebula - Shard Development
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

[center][/center]

About

This is a 317 Shard development, with a 459 gameframe and a 474 cache. I’m using a base called Reality which I plan to spend a few months tweaking, cleaning and expanding via my own creative touch.

What to expect:

[ul][li]Better combat system[/li]
[li]Low experience rate[/li]
[li]Economy driven; make it yourself (only the essential shops)[/li]
[li]Castle Wars, Fight Caves, Fight Pits, Pest Control, Custom minigame for clans[/li]
[li]Storyline theme; but not required[/li]
[li]Small details, such as interactive world objects (bookcases, doors, ladders, chests, drawers etc.)[/li]
[li]Easter eggs (the hidden references kind)[/li]
[li]Secrets (i.e. hidden trapdoors that are not announced but someone may come across if they explore well enough)[/li]
[li]Lots of random events and quests for adequate rewards[/li]
[li]More than one way to train your skills (and not released until they are done properly)[/li][/ul]

Features

[ul][li]Bronze-dragon axes, the better the axe, the faster it cuts[/li]
[li]Each axe requires the correct level[/li]
[li]All trees require the correct level with the correct logs (normal/dead, oak, willow, maple, mahogany, teak, yew and magic)
[/li][li]Bird nests[/li]
[li]Random events (ent, evil tree, genie, strange old man)[/li][/ul]

Progress Log

Project started: Nebula (18th Sep. 2012).

Media

15ydvo5.png307×556

Thread still under construction.
